title: G-steam
description:
G-Steam + Update 1.14 new 5-30-2008

G-steam is a client that allows to download and play some games with the original steam.
You can download about 35 games directly (including cs, css, hl2)
More steam games on G-steam Forum

|G-Steam|

With G-Steam you can download many steam games, (all are not working to download) in the ReadMe.txt you can read about the games who is downloadable.

1) Download and run G-Steam.exe
2) Install and run the update.
3) Enjoy!

Update 1.14 was relesed today 5-30-2008

Have FUN!!!!
